 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרֹם‎</span> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 31</sup>] **verb** ==be shrewd, crafty== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be ill-natured, cross***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִים‎</span> ***shrewd***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, and verb in derived species (Pe\`al in Lexicons)); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive absolute*** in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרֹם יַעְרִם‎</span> [[1Sam.23.22|1Sam 23:22]] ***he is exceedingly crafty***. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect be crafty***, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְרִם‎</span> [[1Sam.23.22|1Sam 23:22]] ***be*** or ***become shrewd*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעְרִם‎</span> [[Prov.15.5|Prov 15:5]]; [[Prov.19.25|Prov 19:25]] all these **Qal** Imperfect in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ִ֯‎</span> according to [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xliii (1889), 180</sup> so [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:63n»§ 63n</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup>, but perhaps read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֶעְרַם‎</span> as **Qal**; ==true== **Hiph\`il** in 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרִימוּ סוֺד‎</span> [[Ps.83.4|Ps 83:4]] ***they make crafty*** (their) ***counsel*** against thy people.
